item.title: capturing the terminal aesthetic
item.description: the candaceserver homepage has this amazing raw terminal feel that’s both nostalgic and modern. design elements color palette dark background (#111) creates that terminal window feel bright green headings (#0f0) for that classic hacker vibe cyan links (#0ff) that shift to magenta when visited yellow on hover (#ff0) for that authentic terminal response typography monospace fonts throughout create consistency with actual terminal output. tone the casual, lowercase writing style (“welcome to candaceserver”, “ive been visited X times”) feels personal and approachable while maintaining the technical aesthetic.
